meanings.sent1: I need to rescreen the movie to make sure it is appropriate for kids.
meanings.sent2: After the first screening, they decided to rescreen the film for errors.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally rescreened the same movie twice, what a silly mistake!
meanings.sent4: She had to rescreen the video multiple times to catch all the details.
meanings.sent5: The director had to rescreen the entire film due to technical issues.

meanings.definition: To check or review something again.
meanings.sent1: I will rescreen my essay before submitting it to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The security team will rescreen all the bags for safety purposes.
meanings.sent3: I had to rescreen my homework because I forgot to include a key point.
meanings.sent4: She decided to rescreen her notes to ensure she didn't miss any important details.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to rescreen the evidence to find the missing clue.

meanings.definition: To repair or replace a screen.
meanings.sent1: I need to rescreen the window to keep the bugs out.
meanings.sent2: The technician will rescreen the damaged monitor to fix the display issue.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally tore the screen and had to rescreen it with a new one.
meanings.sent4: She had to rescreen the door to prevent the mosquitoes from entering.
meanings.sent5: The homeowner decided to rescreen the porch for a fresh look.
